participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and social, Lily enjoys meeting new people and has a vibrant energy that draws others in.
participant_1.background: i've blonde hair and blue eyes. i do not like chicken. i work at a bar at night to pay for college. i recently got an apartment with my best friend.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and cheerful, Emily loves to enjoy life's simple pleasures like good food and leisurely walks.
participant_2.background: i have a boyfriend. i live in a house. i don't drink soda. i like to eat hamburgers and french fries. i like to take walks.
